items.title: Firefighters battle 'emergency level' blazes in Australia heatwave
items.description: Firefighters in Victoria are battling at least six major fires amid a record-breaking heatwave.

items.title: 'Crying horse' toys go viral in China ahead of Lunar New Year
items.description: Shop owners say the frowning toys - originally made in error - are resonating with young workers.

items.title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
items.description: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.

items.title: Watch: Huge landslide in Sicily after Storm Harry
items.description: More than 1,000 residents have been evacuated from their homes on the Italian island.

items.title: 'It's 2C in our flat': Inside Kyiv apartment as Russia targets power and heating
items.description: Russian strikes targeting energy infrastructure have left millions without power in freezing temperatures.
